CustomField.description:
The sub query necessary to populate the multi-select picklist. Query condition field needs a corresponding '{0}' symbol to signify where to capture user selected options if a Sub Query Source is specified.
The first field = Picklist Value, second field = Picklist Label. All other fields are ignored.
Limit is 200 rows for data specified by this subquery. As such the LIMIT command is prohibited.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
If Sub Query Source is a SOQL query, first field = Picklist Value, second field = Picklist Label.
If 'Manual Picklist Value Entry' is checked, enter each picklist value in this box and terminate it with the 'Enter' key.
CustomField.label: Sub Query Source
